title: CVSU Entrance Exam System
technology: Laravel, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, BotMan, Twilio
description: Prototype entrance exam platform developed for Cavite State University to digitize exam administration
Integrated a basic chatbot using BotMan and Twilio for guidance, FAQs, and automated student assistance
Fullstack web application built with Laravel (backend) and Vue.js (frontend), styled with Tailwind CSS

title: Student Management System
description: Web-based platform designed for managing student records and school-related data
Supports CRUD operations for student profiles including enrollment, grades, and personal details
Responsive front-end built with Bootstrap, with backend integration in PHP and MySQL database

title: React Portfolio
description: Responsive personal portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and experiences
Implemented smooth scroll animations using AOS for a dynamic user experience
Custom icon sets integrated with Iconify and styled with Bootstrap for modern design consistency

title: Little Lemon Restaurant
description: Restaurant-themed web application with features for table reservation, menu browsing, and booking management
Developed using Next.js 13 App Router for optimized routing and scalability
State management handled via Context API for persistent user sessions and cart functionality
Enhanced user experience with interactive UI components such as modals and toast notifications

title: Memeify
description: Lightweight meme generator enabling users to create, edit, and share custom memes instantly
Supports drag-and-drop image uploads with live preview functionality
Designed with a responsive layout ensuring seamless use across desktop and mobile devices

title: Yummify
description: Recipe discovery application powered by REST API integration for real-time data
Allows users to search recipes by ingredients, categories, or cuisine preferences
Features step-by-step cooking instructions with a clean and intuitive user interface

title: Tenzies Dice Game
description: Interactive dice game where players roll dice until all match a target number
Includes win condition tracking, score recording, and game reset functionality
Playful and responsive UI design with smooth animations for an engaging user experience

title: Code Rescue: Word Quest
description: Educational word puzzle game with a coding-inspired rescue mission theme
Progressive levels of difficulty to challenge players’ problem-solving and vocabulary
Clean and responsive UI design optimized for both desktop and mobile play

title: VanLife - Van Rental Platform
description: Front-end design van rental platform designed for both travelers and van hosts
Advanced filtering and sorting options by van type (Simple, Rugged, Luxury) with dynamic UI updates
Host dashboard to manage van listings, availability, and customer reviews
Implemented simple secure authentication with protected routes and role-based access
Mobile-first approach using Tailwind CSS with scalable front-end architecture powered by Vite and TypeScript

title: Marci Metzger Landing Page
description: Modern landing page redesign for Marci Metzger’s real estate services
Responsive Next.js application showcasing property listings and services
Hero and About sections with engaging CTAs and detailed service info
Property highlights, gallery, and search functionality for easy browsing
Contact form and interactive map for seamless customer engagement
Deployed on Vercel with performance-optimized Next.js features
